mdRecord.dcterms:title: Nursing student
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Nursing student Edna Long. Notation on back, "What Happens to 'Miss America' Candidates? Edna Long of Richmond, who was "Miss Virginia" in the Atlantic City contest three years ago is in training as a student nurse at the University of Virginia. After taking time out to pose for fashion pictures for Mademoiselle Magazine and to model in a Richmond fashion show, she is back preparing for the nursing career she selected long before her first adventure as a glamour girl."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
